text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Tadah! Pop quiz for you! Who's the super cool, ultra wonderful, greatest horsegirl in the world?!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Tick, tock, tick, tock…… Quick, quick, 
you only have 30 seconds left!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Shut it. You expect me to play along 
with your dumb game?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ehhh, Sirius, don't tell me you don't know such a basic thing? Aw, you're so hopeleeess.

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
I'll give you a big hint then! 
That horsegirl～……

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Tsk…… Even if I knew her name, I'd never say it. No matter how much everyone else believes in her, I'll keep rejecting her…!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
You were that conscious of me!? 
Aw, you're making me flustered～! 
That's right, it was I, Tokai Teio♪

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Ehehe, a horsegirl that everyone 
believes in～?♪ I didn't expect you to 
acknowledge my strength that much!

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Huuuuuh!? No, damn it! You little…… stop dancing! Don't get carried away!
